description: Alternative weekly newspaper in Birmingham, Alabama
label: Black & White
title: Black_&_White_(Birmingham_newspaper)
exrest: Black & White was a biweekly alternative newspaper covering news and culture in Birmingham, Alabama. It was established in 1992 by Chuck Geiss, who continued to own and publish the paper until it shut down in early 2013. A member of the Association of Alternative Newsmedia, it described itself as "Birmingham's oldest and largest non-daily publication". When Black & White suspended publication in 2013, Geiss initially intended to relaunch it with a new business model, but this plan never came to fruition, and the paper ended up permanently shutting down. AL.com described Black & White as "...a victim of the contraction of the print news industry nationwide in the face of advancing digital alternatives."
